mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, COUNT, USER_NO,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, COUNT, USER_NO,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO = 'Q' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, COUNT, USER_NO,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO = 'C' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
